attributes.action: change the current first past the post voting system to a proportional representation voting system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK virtually operates on a two party system leaving parties other than Conservative and Labour at a severe disadvantage. Also figures show that only 2 out of 10 people in the UK voted for Labour in the last general election. A PR voting system would increase turnout by making each individual vote count. If PR had been in place previous perhaps such things as the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq could have been avoided and the plan to introduce ID cards could be more adequately opposed.
